attributes.action: Keep gyms open during UK lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Lockdown is a very hard time for people who suffer with mental health and as statistics have shown, many people have took their life during this pandemic. For some people going to the gym is the only thing that helps people stay sane, as well as keeping a positive mindset as a whole.
attributes.background: Gyms should remain open during lockdown, they are a major contributor to helping those who suffer with mental health. Gyms should remain open during this lockdown to help those who suffer with mental health.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
